bug.description: Hello, guys. When I try to use mlagents in Windows, Unity logo become weird in the console. Anyone know how to resolve it? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25996824/64942170-f9dbb700-d89a-11e9-8b0a-36ef9150a3aa.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/haoxiangli6>@haoxiangli6</denchmark-link>
This seems to be an issue caused by the font being used in your console. The logo is designed to display with certain fixed-width fonts, which yours seems to not be one of.

Weirdly, it actually doesn't look like that font's character width is too inconsistent, but it is likely still the cause. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25126921/65198697-6fc46600-dac7-11e9-8d52-4888a4af4663.PNG></denchmark-link>
To change the font in Windows 10 CMD:
search "Command Prompt" in the start bar right click the result > 'Open File Location' right click the Command Prompt executable (now shown in the File Explorer) > 'Properties' click the 'Fonts' tab and select something monospaced (generally anything with Mono or Console in the name, or if there's a default selection)
Hope that helps! + Either way the logo is not going to affect the framework performance ðŸ™ƒ

Sorry for the delayed response. Thanks for checking on this. We will try to see how we might resolve it so that we can avoid people seeing the deformed logo :) We are tracking this internally with MLA-757
